msbt.message: Here I am, an up-and-coming pop star surrounded by gobs of stylish art and other cool cultural stuff. Are you, like, thinking what I'm thinking?!I'm thinking someone should totes take my pic and put it on the cover of my fave new magazine It's called The Sophisticated and it is sooo me, !

Ever notice how things that are really tasteful never go out of style not even when they're totes old. Take all the art and cultural stuff around this place, for example. They say it's "timeless." Well, that's how I want to be too Super hip and stylish for ALL ETERNITY!

I love looking at art, you know? Like, it is seriously one of my favorite things to do. But you know what I don't like? I don't like when someone tries to tell me exactly what a piece of art means. All that really matters is what it means to ME, right?And what it means to me is always way cooler than the "real" meaning anyway, .
I am sooo proud of the art we've collected here at the museum! I don't mean to brag, but we are, like, super cultured here on this island, .
The art exhibit on is, like, super top-notch. I mean, I should know, ! After all, I am way into the fine arts. Like, ALL the fine arts! Music. Dancing. Painting. Larping.
Don't you love how when you visit , you get to see all these awesome works of art? Of course, you also get to see THIS awesome work of art!Haha! That's just my way of saying you should visit a lot, !

The Museum has an art exhibit now! It's sooo exciting, right?I hear art is, like, really really IN right now. So I'm going to take up painting as soon as I get home. My stuff will be hanging on these walls in no time, !

The minute I heard about the art exhibit opening at the museum, I rushed right over! As a pop-music artist myself, I think it's important for me to show support for ALL the art in . Also, I think being seen in an art museum is really good for my image. Tell everyone you saw me here, 'K?

Ohmigosh, I was so happy when I heard the museum was opening an art exhibit! Fashion is also a kind of art, you know. And since I'm basically this island's fashion icon I figured it was, like, my duty to come here and stand around so folks could see me, .
